snippet: The motorcyclists have been indicted in connection with the assault on a man who was driving a Range Rover with his wife and infant son on the Henry Hudson Parkway in September.
abstract: Eleven motorcyclists, including undercover New York City Police Detective Wojciech Braszczok, have been indicted in connection with assault of driver Alexian Lien on Henry Hudson Parkway during motorcycle rally; all but one of defendants is charged with gang assault.
lead_paragraph: The motorcyclists have been indicted in connection with the assault on a man who was driving a Range Rover with his wife and infant son on the Henry Hudson Parkway in September.

headline.main: 11 Motorcyclists Are Indicted in Assault on an S.U.V. Driver
headline.print_headline: 11 Motorcyclists Are Indicted In Assault on an S.U.V. Driver
